overview: In "Falling. Desert. Syn" there is the body of repetitionâ€”not of tautology but of smooth resurrection; a body dying and being resurrected in a dance without suffering. A body of the desert, which is not deserted, but instead possessed by a force of attraction towards the sky, a force as strong as the one towards the earth. A body for the stars, the same one which plunges into the underworlds.
title: Falling. Desert. Syn
